title: WAVELET-POOLING-BASED MULTI-SCALE CNN FOR COVID-19 DETECTION FROM CT IMAGES
details: A Singh, VP Gopi, A Thomas - Biomedical Engineering: Applications, Basis and …, 2024
abstract: COVID-19 is a respiratory disease affecting humans and animals. The disease has rapidly spread worldwide and became a pandemic in 2020. Preventing the virus from spreading has become increasingly challenging, especially with the need to test …
